If you're looking for a sulfate-free shampoo that can help control oil and add texture and volume to your hair, you may want to consider a product that contains natural ingredients such as tea tree oil or charcoal. These ingredients can help absorb excess oil and clarify the scalp, while also adding volume and texture to your hair.

Here are a few sulfate-free shampoos that contain tea tree oil or charcoal that you may want to consider:

1. Paul Mitchell Tea Tree Special Shampoo: This sulfate-free shampoo is formulated with tea tree oil, peppermint, and lavender to help control oil and clarify the scalp, while also adding volume and texture to your hair.
2. Bumble and bumble Scalp Detox Charcoal Shampoo: This sulfate-free shampoo is formulated with charcoal and glycerin to help absorb excess oil and clarify the scalp, while also adding volume and texture to your hair.
3. Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Tea Tree Scalp Treatment Shampoo: This sulfate-free shampoo is formulated with charcoal, tea tree oil, and witch hazel to help absorb excess oil and clarify the scalp, while also adding volume and texture to your hair.

I hope these recommendations are helpful! If you have any specific questions or concerns, don't hesitate to ask.
